body:
Modifications :
- [x] added `flake8` ~~and `pep8`~~ checks to Travis
- [x] added coverage results to unit tests
- [x] added a style file for `yapf` which is conformant with the checks above

Notes :
- I didn't add `pylint` as it requires more set-up. According to the [documentation](http://docs.pylint.org/faq.html#running-pylint) it can be run only on packages or modules, not single files.

Follows from #337
title: Code checking : flake8 and code coverage
